title: You're main plays league of legends...

replies.body:
Well, at this point I'm not really maining anybody but...

Dr. Mundo mains Vayne botlane for the ( see below ) Heartseeker skin, himself toplane/jungle so he can experiment ( with item builds ( see lore ) on himself and dodges any game involving him being a midlaner or support for anybody not-Heartseeker Vayne because "Mundo go where he pleases."

http://ddragon.leagueoflegends.com/cdn/img/champion/splash/Vayne_4.jpg
{{champion:127}} mains {{champion:22}} so that Liss can finally feel like she has taken over her tribe.
{{champion:89}} mains {{champion:268}} because he praises the sun

{{champion:203}} 

Lamb mains Udyr, and Wolf mains Warwick.

The meta-reality is real.
{{champion:78}} would probably be too dumb to try to main herself.

{{champion:78}} Who is that? She looks exactly like me and even has my name! It's like we're twins or something!
Swain mains azir because azir is very mechanically difficult and swain likes difficulty
{{champion:45}} Mains {{champion:76}} "Stalking prey again?" "I am evil, stop laughing!"
{{champion:6}} Mains {{champion:86}} So he can feed. (Just Lore Jokes)
{{champion:44}} mains {{champion:72}} because Gems are truly Outrageous

{{champion:62}} would main {{champion:92}} to know what it feels resourceless

{{champion:150}} would main {{champion:23}} cause he secretly wishes his rage could heal him
{{champion:103}}  mains {{champion:32}}  to finally be his friend
{{champion:55}} mains {{champion:84}} because she misses being able to 1 v 1.
